description:
- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Disclaimer: 
In the application, you cannot watch films and series for free, but you can find in the application a complete description of the series and films and also the service on which you can watch them.

This app uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb: https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

Москва — это огромный мир, где находится место всем: бизнесменам, чиновникам, звездам шоу-бизнеса, панкам, и блогерам. Здесь живут и работают лучшие умы России и сотни тысяч приезжих рабочих, здесь решается судьба всей страны и пишутся десятки миллионов личных историй. Для каждого Москва своя, особенная. Если ты двигаешься в темпе большого города — заходи к нам!

Актуальные новости Москвы, России и мира в одном приложении.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

Vous êtes un parieur expérimenté ou un passionné de turf ? C’est l’appli qu’il vous faut: 
- La base de données hippique la plus riche  

- Des filtres intuitifs pour un papier pertinent

- Des pronos grâce à des journalistes experts sur le terrain 7j/7

- Les infos en temps réel en direct de l’hippodrome

- Le replay des courses 



 Faites le papier rapidement et simplement des courses de trot, de galop et de plat. 

"Le top pour faire le papier"

"Application qui me permet de composer le tiercé et couplés et de me référer aux courses passées"

"J’adore la publication des résultats ultra rapide"

"Une appli top. La sélection de chevaux en fonction de la course est facile."

"J’utilise cette application depuis des années et elle était pour moi la meilleure application de turf qui existe."







FACILE A PRENDRE EN MAIN

Dès l’écran d’accueil : 

Retrouvez le programme des courses du jour. 

Accédez aux courses à venir 

Retrouvez les courses de la veille avec les replays

Avec les filtres intuitifs, comparez les chevaux et personnalisez votre analyse facilement : hippodrome, distance, spécialités (trot, galop, etc.), surface, autostart, déferrage, handicaps, œillères, et plus 




ANALYSE COMPLÈTE DES COURSES

Profitez de la base de données Paris-Turf. Consultez les informations clés : hippodrome, numéro de course, réunion, heure de départ, allocation, corde, catégorie, chevaux, jockeys, entraîneurs, etc.


Explorez chaque cheval avec des détails sur ses performances. Découvrez les classements, cotes, distances, temps, et commentaires des journalistes Paris-Turf. Tout sur les courses hippiques: partants,cotes, interviews exclusives, rapports probables…


Pronostics Experts: Laissez-vous guider par nos spécialistes pour des pronostics PMU et Quinté fiables. Bénéficiez de l’exhaustivité de la base ParisTurf


Résultats Instantanés: Suivez les résultats des courses en temps réel, avec des rapports définitifs et des statistiques approfondies.




En créant votre compte: 

- Ajoutez des notes sur un cheval

- Soyez alerté sur votre  cheval favori quand il part



Avec l’abonnement, accédez : 

- À plus de filtres, 

- Aux interviews de nos experts

- Aux pronos de nos experts 





UN COMPAGNON QUINTÉ, TIERCÉ, QUARTÉ INÉGALÉ

- Paris Hippiques Simplifiés: Qu'il s'agisse du Tiercé, Quarté ou Quinté, ParisTurf Live vous offre les outils nécessaires pour parier avec confiance.

- Stratégies Gagnantes: Apprenez des meilleurs avec des analyses et pronostics détaillés.


D’une course à réclamer aux Groupes 1 (Prix d’Amérique, Prix de Cornulier, Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe, Prix de Diane, Prix du Jockey Club, Grand Steeple Chase de Paris, Grand Prix de Paris) en passant par les Listed Races, faites tout simplement le papier comme un expert. 




TOUJOURS À JOUR

- Mises à Jour en Temps Réel: Restez informé de l'état des terrains et des dernières nouvelles des courses.

- Support Client Réactif: Notre équipe est à votre disposition pour toute question ou assistance technique. 



Rejoignez la communauté des experts avec ParisTurf Live – votre allié pour des paris hippiques stratégiques et informés.




UNE SUGGESTION

Vous aimez Paris Turf ? Soutenez-nous en déposant un avis et 5 étoiles

Aidez-nous à améliorer notre application en nous écrivant à contact@paris-turf.com 




Politique de Confidentialité : https://www.paris-turf.com/charte-de-confidentialite

Architectural Digest (AD), the international authority on design and architecture, offers exclusive access to the world’s most beautiful homes and the fascinating people who live in them. Bringing its audience a wealth of information on architecture and interior design, art and antiques, travel destinations, and extraordinary products, its AD100 list of top architects and designers is one of the industry’s most relied-upon indexes of talent.

The Architectural Digest digital edition app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Non-subscribers may access a selection of complimentary articles each month.

AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL: Your payment method will be automatically charged at the frequency and price noted in the subscription offer you select, until you cancel. To cancel, you must update your App Store Subscriptions settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription term. No refunds once payment is made.

app_name: Books You Must Read in Life
description:
Welcome to Books You Must Read in Your Lifetime, the perfect app for all reading lovers! In this app, you will find a community of readers where you can share your own suggestions, search for and read books that other users have uploaded to the “Socialteca” section, and connect with other reading enthusiasts. You can “like” your favorite books and see which ones are the most popular in the community.

Moreover, this app comes with a series of useful features to help you enjoy your reading to the fullest. You can save your favorite books for later access, switch between dark and light modes according to your preferences, and keep track of the page you last read.

If you have any questions or issues regarding copyright in our app, do not hesitate to contact us.

With Books You Must Read in Your Lifetime, reading will be easier and more fun than ever. Download the app and start discovering new titles that will change your life!

Discover the YouScribe App
With the YouScribe app, you can explore a vibrant library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, podcasts, and more! Choose your favorite titles, build personalized reading lists, and stream thousands of works on your phone, tablet, or laptop. You can even enjoy your library offline—anytime, anywhere.

Why You’ll Love YouScribe

A dynamic library to match your interests
- A unique catalogue spanning over 120 themes: novels and short stories, sci-fi, romance, thrillers, personal development, professional resources, and much more.
- Learn and level up with lessons, theses, research papers, essays, and technical or professional documents.
- Smart recommendations to help you discover local and international hits tailored to your taste.
- Multi-format reading—seamlessly switch between text and audio on mobile, tablet, or computer.

Your portable, personalized library
- Offline mode: download and read anywhere, even without an internet connection.
- Automatic sync: pick up right where you left off, on any device.
- Reading comfort: dark mode, adjustable fonts, bookmarks, sleep timer, and more.
- Advanced search: find exactly what you’re looking for in seconds.
- Customized collections: create your own themed shelves and reading lists.
- Community connection: follow your favorite authors and their new releases.
- Personalized experience: receive tailored notifications about new content and features.

How It Works
YouScribe is available in more than 25 countries and offers a constantly expanding catalogue of local and international titles in over 11 languages.
Your subscription gives you unlimited access to our regularly updated library of audiobooks, eBooks, comics, newspapers, and more.
Subscriptions made through the app are billed to your Apple account and renew automatically at the end of each period, unless you turn off auto-renewal in your Apple account settings at least 24 hours before renewal.
If a free trial is available, you’ll need to provide a payment method when signing up—but don’t worry! You won’t be charged if you cancel before the trial ends.
The catalogue, languages, and subscription options may vary by region. Some titles or offers mentioned here may not be available in your country or plan.

Our Commitments
For the price of a single book, enjoy unlimited access to our entire catalogue—and cancel anytime.
We partner with publishers, authors, and creators around the world to bring you a living library that reflects you and your world.
Whether you love reading at night, listening during your commute, or taking a break in the middle of the day—YouScribe is there for you, wherever and whenever inspiration strikes.

Download the app today and open the door to thousands of stories, skills, and discoveries.

WebComics™ features over 5 million reads of webtoon, manga and manhwa on numerous genres, allowing you to access these manga & manhua without the need to purchase physical copies!
 
Top-ranking Author Team
Join our diverse community of WebComics authors from around the globe! Our talented webtoon & comic creators produce captivating content daily. Don't miss out on the opportunity to be a part of our brilliant team!
Send us your work right now! Email: comiceditor@webcomicsapp.com
 
Follow Us

Facebook: @WebComicsOfficial
Twitter: @Webcomics_app
Instagram: @WebComicsOfficial

Customer Service Email: Webcomics@sidewalkgroup.com
 
Subscription Pricing & Terms
$5.99/month for Premium
$17.99/quarter for Premium
$69.99/year for Premium

$599.99/year for PLUS
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account upon the confirmation of purchase.

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS
SPOT MEDIA  BIAS
DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS
CHECK THE RELIABILITY OF SOURCES
SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.


About Your Ground News Subscription: 
Subscriptions renew monthly and can be managed through your App Store account
Payment will be charged to your App Store Account on confirmation of purchase
Renewal is automatic unless turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Subscriptions can also be managed through Ground News by going to your Account Settings after purchase 

See full terms and conditions here: https://ground.news/terms-and-conditions

With this app, everything Le Monde has to offer is in one place. 
- Keep up with the news via our homepage, curated by Le Monde in English journalists.
- All of “Le Monde in English” articles: reports, investigations, opinion pieces, and more.
- Our videos, photos, and infographics.

We’ve included a number of features to enhance your reading experience.
- Switch to dark mode or change your font to personalize your reading experience.
- Save the articles you want to read later.
- Pick your own sections to see the news that interests you.

Le Monde in English delivers in-depth and reliable news coverage on a wide-range of topics:
- News from France, Europe and the world.
- The latest news across our many sections: Environment, Business, Politics, Investigations, and more.
- Along with coverage on sports, technology, science, culture, and the arts.

When you subscribe to Le Monde in English, you are supporting an independent newsroom of over 530 journalists, and benefitting from unlimited access to Le Monde in English content, on the website and the app.

If you have any questions or encounter a technical issue, take a look at our FAQ to see if your question has already been answered, or reach out to our support team via “Report a problem” in the app settings.

General terms and conditions: https://moncompte.lemonde.fr/cgv-en

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.

All Access plan - The premium CNN experience: streaming, exclusive videos, articles, and more.
• 24/7 global news
• Live coverage
• Exclusive videos
• Original series
• Award-winning films

Basic plan - The basic CNN experience

SOYEZ ALERTÉS, POUR TOUT SAVOIR EN TEMPS RÉEL



Politique, Économie, International, Culture, Science, Santé, Espionnage… ne ratez rien. Profitez de toute l’actu en continu. Accédez à tout ce qui vous intéresse. Vivez un journalisme indépendant, à chaque instant.


PROFITEZ D’UNE NOUVELLE LECTURE DU MONDE


Nous avons repensé notre app pour une expérience plus confortable.
- Accédez aux articles et à toute l’info, même sans connexion grâce au mode hors-ligne
- Personnalisez vos newsletters pour une information exclusive, qui vous ressemble.
- Sauvegardez vos articles avec la fonctionnalité “Ajout aux favoris”.
- Écoutez vos articles pour le plaisir de découvrir l’actualité librement.



TRANSFORMEZ VOTRE LECTURE EN AVENTURE !


Redécouvrez le savoir grâce à une expérience ludique.

- Pronostics : Tous les jours, une question en lien avec l’actualité. Saurez-vous viser juste ?
- Les 7 menteurs : saurez-vous les démasquer ? Chaque jour, une question de culture générale. 
- Le bon nombre : saurez-vous le deviner ? Retrouvez directement dans nos articles des questions sur le thème de votre lecture.


Explorez l’information, cumulez des points et remportez des récompenses. 
Les meilleurs d’entre vous auront peut-être la chance de gagner une rencontre à la rédaction !


TOUS LES JOURS, VOUS AVEZ RENDEZ-VOUS AVEC NOUS



Impertinents, nos éditorialistes à la plume acérée vous éclairent sur les grands sujets de notre époque. Sans langue de bois, ils vous convient à la réflexion et à la liberté d’esprit, 
en osant le pas de côté.



EXPLOREZ NOTRE ÉPOQUE SANS COMPROMIS


Entre interviews privilégiées et grandes enquêtes, plongez au cœur du savoir. Une autre lecture du monde s’ouvre à vous, fiable, audacieuse, exigeante et indépendante. Notre marque de fabrique : aller voir par nous-même.



REJOIGNEZ LES ESPRITS LIBRES



Sur tous les fronts, nos journalistes vont là où l’Histoire se construit. Passionnés, ils vous racontent notre époque en encourageant le doute et la curiosité. Plus qu’un journal, Le Point vous invite à la contre-pensée, et au plaisir de savoir.



ABONNEZ-VOUS AU POINT


Abonnez-vous à l’offre d’info 100% numérique directement depuis l’app et bénéficiez de 14 jours d’essai offerts !

Profitez pleinement des services inclus dans votre abonnement : 
-Accédez en illimité à l’ensemble des contenus, gratuits et payants de l’appli et du site web, avec votre compte.
-Profitez de chaque numéro du journal en avant-première, en version numérique, la veille de la parution en kiosque. 
-Commentez la presse et débattez de l’info avec les autres lecteurs du Point. 

- Offre mensuelle : 11,99€ par mois
- Offre annuelle : 119,99€ (soit 2 mois offerts)



À l’issue de la période d’essai, l’abonnement au journal prend effet automatiquement. 
Le montant est débité à la confirmation. Il est automatiquement reconduit sauf si cette option est désactivée dans les 24 heures précédant la fin de la période en cours. L’abonnement et son renouvellement automatique peuvent être gérés à tout moment et en toute simplicité en vous rendant sur votre compte dans l’App Store après l’achat.

TOUS LES NUMÉROS DU JOURNAL EN ÉDITION DIGITALE

Bonne lecture !

Mobilis est une application pour la lecture de fiction, dédiée à servir tous les amateurs de fiction! Nous avons une variété de thèmes, y compris la fantaisie, les arts martiaux, la romance, l'histoire urbaine, le campus et bien plus encore. Tout ce que vous pouvez imaginer est ici! Nous mettons à jour la librairie quotidiennement, libérant de nouveaux chapitres en quelques secondes. Cela ne pourrait pas être plus pratique pour les lecteurs! Et nous avons également divers événements qui vous attendent! Nous continuons à réviser nos contenus, pour être votre compagnon de lecture le plus proche. 
Nous avons des - 
【Fictions massives】 Couvre des fictions en ligne populaires avec diverses listes et une classification fine, y compris une section masculine et féminine, des livres sélectionnés, des recommandations intelligentes et plus encore! 
【Expérience de lecture de qualité】 Personnalisez votre lecture avec le tournage de page 3D simulé, le téléchargement hors ligne, le changement de police, le fond et le mode nuit. Nous présentons des couvertures de livres exquises, une mise en page de contenu soignée et de nombreux autres designs délicats pour assurer une bonne expérience. 
【Service personnalisé】 Diverses couleurs d'arrière-plan, polices fines. Réglez votre lecteur personnel d'un simple clic. 

【Synchronisation intelligente】 La progression de la lecture et les notes peuvent être synchronisées de fa?on intelligente et enregistrées dans votre compte. Pas besoin de vous soucier de changer d'appareil. 


à propos des abonnements renouvelables automatiquement 
- Les abonnements auto-renouvelables dans l'application incluent des packs de pièces d'enregistrement et des plans d'adhésion VIP.
- Période de facturation: les packs de pièces d'enregistrement sont disponibles sur une base mensuelle, trimestrielle et annuelle. Facturation mensuelle et trimestrielle pour les plans d'adhésion VIP.
- Prix: Les frais des packs de pièces d'enregistrement pour une période de facturation mensuelle sont de 7  et 13 USD, une période de facturation trimestrielle de 20 et 38 USD et une période de facturation annuelle de 60 et 98 USD. 
Les frais d'adhésion VIP pour une période de facturation mensuelle sont de 7 et 18 USD, une période de facturation trimestrielle est de 20  et 48 USD et une période de facturation annuelle est de 60 et 190 USD.

- Paiement: L'achat sera débité de votre compte iTunes. 
- Renouvellement: lorsque vous vous abonnez à un pack de pièces d'enregistrement, votre abonnement se renouvelle automatiquement. Vous serez facturé au début de chaque cycle de facturation jusqu'à ce que vous annuliez votre abonnement. Les abonnements sont automatiquement facturés pour chaque période de facturation, mensuelle ou autre, et vous pouvez être facturé dans les 24 heures avant le début de chaque période de facturation. 
- Annulation: Vous pouvez annuler un abonnement à tout moment au moins 24 heures avant votre date de renouvellement.

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic
